title: MONDAY 4/26 - DRAFT WEEK BUZZ
itunes:title: MONDAY 4/26 - DRAFT WEEK BUZZ
description:
The 49ers (0:12) have narrowed their QB search to two prospects that they may select with the third overall pick. Lions GM Brad Holmes (0:33) keeping his options open with the 7th overall pick while Panthers head coach Matt Rhule (1:20) lets us in on what he looks for in a draft prospect. The Colts (2:11) possibly looking to add some help on the defensive line in the draft, and the Browns (3:11) hoping to build on their success in 2020. Plus, Patrick Peterson (3:56) making a number change in Minnesota

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
